message: Some of us might suffer from this, but it seems there is a logic behind.
story: Ahmed Kamal shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: TCP congestion control - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
caption: en.wikipedia.org
description: Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) uses a network congestion-avoidance algorithm that includes various aspects of an additive increase/multiplicative decrease (AIMD) scheme, with other schemes such as slow-start and congestion window to achieve congestion avoidance. The TCP congestion-avoidance alg...

data.message:
How do you suffer from slow-start? unless your connection lasts for < 20-30 RTT?

generally, congestion control in tcp is engineered to work with most of the networks (e.g., it has problems with wireless networks; it deals with medium loss as congestion).. so, some applications may suffer from these algorithms but (I think) most of these problems have workarounds (at the application level)...
